THE  BONE  CAVE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ header_2_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ header_2_font_size=”28px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Interactive online gatherings to re-enchant and reimagine women’s stories – with Dr Sharon Blackie

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#893e39″ custom_padding=”||92px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”43px|auto||auto||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ text_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_3_text_color=”#FCFCF2″ hover_enabled=”0″ header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”1.3em” header_2_line_height_phone=”” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Purchase a bundle of 11 individual Bone Cave sessions

 

This bundle includes eleven single-session Bone Cave gatherings: The Rooted Woman, Descent, Psyche and Eros, Women of the Mabinogion, Women of the Islands, The Mystery of the Grail, A Psyche the Size of Earth, The Cave of Dreams, Reclaiming the Dark Feminine, The Holy Longing, and Brigid and the Return of the Light.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||134px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ custom_margin=”-91px|||||” custom_padding=”79px||80px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_font=”|||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||20px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

free gatherings

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||30px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/tree-hands-OPT-1.jpg” title_text=”tree-hands-OPT” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_line_height=”1.1em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

IF WOMEN ROSE ROOTED: RECLAIMING THE MYTHIC FEMININE

My first event in the Bone Cave was a free live webinar based on my book, If Women Rose Rooted. I spoke about the process of writing it, how the inspiration came about, but most of all, how my ideas on reclaiming the mythic feminine have progressed in the intervening four or more years. There was also a chance for participants to ‘ask me anything’ about any issue related to the book.

This live event took place on 12 December, 2020, but you can watch the recording at this link.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive signed book and course giveaways that are exclusively for subscribers, and a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Gather around Sharon Blackie’s virtual fire pit in the Bone Cave, for online workshops on the mythic feminine and mythic imagination.
